Package edu.bu.pas.pacman.game.entity

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.pas.pacman.game.entity.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ghost, Pacman
public class Entity extends Object
A class that represents an arbitrary entity on the map. An entity is either pacman or a ghost. Each entity has a unique id that you can use to query the game and a current position on the map.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object other)
      A method used to compare an entity to another Object. Two entities are equal if they have the same unique id and the same current location.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Returns:
      true if the two entities are equal and false otherwise.
